attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Your policies have always failed and you have consisently lied to the British public. For example, Iraq, WOMD, NHS, Taxes, the list is endless.  Is there one good thing you have done?  No, so do the decent thing and go today.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
